Description: On I-95 at mile marker 92.8 in the County of Hanover, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south left shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-29 in the County of Albemarle, in the vicinity of Greenbrier Dr; Rt. 866E/W (Albemarle County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-64 West at mile marker 180.7 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
